layout.description: Hiring our Software Factory is ensuring innovative and personalized technological solutions to boost your business.

inicio.cardDescricao: This card is just a demonstration of how your site could look like.
inicio.bannerDescricao: The software factory is a model site to demonstrate how the client's institutional single-page site would look like.
inicio.sectionCardDescricao: The software factory is a specialized center that uses industrial processes and agile methodologies to develop innovative and personalized software solutions, meeting the specific needs of clients.

duvidas.perguntasComuns: Frequently Asked Questions about Website Creation
duvidas.perguntaCusto: How much does website creation cost?
duvidas.respostaCusto: The initial cost for a One Page site starts from $99.90.
duvidas.perguntaCustoTotal: If I request a site with two pages and a custom theme, what would be the total cost?
duvidas.perguntaCustoAdicional: Are there any other additional costs?
duvidas.respostaCustoAdicional: By choosing to contract directly with me through a contract, there are choices of additional costs.
duvidas.tabelaAdicional3: Package of Maintenance Hours (minimum 10 hours per month)
